actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the lease and transfer of tobacco from marketing quotas to farms in contiguous counties within the same State.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to permit the owner and operator of any farm for which a tobacco acreage allotment is established to lease all or any part of such allotment or quota to any other owner or operator of a farm in the same county for use in such county.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the lease and transfer of tobacco from marketing quotas to farms in contiguous counties within the same State.
